item.description:
Hi Journeyers to wholeness,

Did you know you could turn a persistent self-judgment into an icing on a cake?
Come and celebrate you!

Have you ever felt they you could be living from a place of authentic self but something "is holding you back"?
If you have time to join us this Thursday I have a yummy surprise for you. During the meetup I am going to teach a brand new, extremely powerful and effortless technique I have just came up with. It allows you to extract all the wonderful, colorful and multifaceted parts of you lost to old and persistent self-judgment or anger, or past trauma.

All of us are faced with physical and emotional challenges on our life path, some more then others.

We all want to overcome blocks, once and for all
And be healthier, happier and more fulfilled.
But many of you who are coming to this meetup have arrived just at the point when they thought all hope was lost, not sure any longer you could "pull it off"

However there is a tool, EDR â€“ Energetic Displacement reintegration, so powerful, so transformation, so life-altering, that everything changes. You can be living your will again with all the passion of the authentic re-integrated YOU.

This is a SUPER valuable stuff, and as always we have great time learning it.
So sign up early and Join us this Thursday for more powerful skills and techniques needed on your journey to freedom.

------------------------

group.name: Freedom from Fear/ Anxiety /Emotional Trauma Group

item.name: An Icing On the cake - Celebrate You!
